meanings.sent1: After the hike, the hungry hiker started gormandizing on the snacks in his backpack.
meanings.sent2: She was so hungry that she began gormandizing the delicious buffet spread before anyone else.
meanings.sent3: The kids gormandized on the candy at the party, leaving none for the adults.
meanings.sent4: The squirrel gormandized on the nuts, storing them away for the winter.
meanings.sent5: The bear gormandized on the berries, filling its belly for a long winter's nap.

meanings.definition: The act of eating greedily or excessively.
meanings.sent1: The gormandizing at the all-you-can-eat buffet was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent2: His gormandizing at the dinner table was a topic of discussion among the family.
meanings.sent3: The gormandizing at the food festival led to many satisfied and full attendees.
meanings.sent4: Her gormandizing of the chocolates left her feeling a bit queasy.
meanings.sent5: The gormandizing of the cookies at the bake sale raised a lot of money for charity.
